item.title: TypeScript source code generation
item.description: Generate valid TypeScript source code programmatically with a metaprogramming technique It’s about time for another blog post… been a while! While I still owe it to myself to write the 2nd part of the previous blog post (does anybody have tips for shitty bugs?), I thought it would be time to write about a different topic - Metaprogramming as programming technique. Sometimes writing source code can get a bit repetitive. Anytime I encounter such a feeling I reflect on my life and how I never wanted to do any assembly-line work, as I did in my childhood during the summer holidays, ever again.
